summary: A teacher's world is torn apart when his wife and children are brutally murdered at the hands of a ruthless gang. Left for dead and with no one to turn to, he takes matters into his own hands and hits the streets in search of justice.
cast: Vinnie Jones|Nicole Faraday|Sebastian Street|Sean Cronin|Dan Richardson|Conor Boru|Benjamin Way|Sarah Alexandra Marks|Michael Bailey|Mitchell Fisher|Jared Morgan|Lee Bane|Finelle Grace Batista|Kane Surry|Kevin Foster
title: Kill Kane
